options.jql: =project in (PRODBUGS, DEVBUGS, "Andrew Bug Test") AND issuetype = Bug AND status != Closed AND status != Resolved AND created >= -90d ORDER BY created DESC

assignments.name: newTicketSummary
assignments.value: ={{ $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created1').item.json.fields?.summary || $input.first().json.fields?.summary || 'Test ticket summary' }}

assignments.name: newTicketDescription
assignments.value: ={{ $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created1').item.json.fields?.description || $('Jira Trigger - New Bug Created1').item.json.renderedFields?.description || $input.first().json.fields?.description || 'No description provided' }}
